When you think about essential kitchen items, chances are a high-quality Dutch oven is one of the first pieces that comes to mind. Dutch ovens are multifunctional, and if you invest in a great one and take care of it, it can last a lifetime. Staub is the brand behind some of the most popular Dutch ovens, partly because they’re so well-made, and partly because they’re so chic.

If you love your Dutch oven as much as the rest of us, why not add a little variety into your kitchenware lineup? The Staub Stoneware Pastel Mini Cocottes are basically tiny versions of the tried-and-true Staub Dutch oven, and they present a world of infinitely more cooking possibilities. The best part? They’re currently on sale for $40 off their original price.

The set of mini cocottes comes with six stoneware bakers and their matching lids. They come in six stunning pastel hues, including a light pink and darker pink, light blue and darker blue, and a light green and darker green. They’re so cute you might want them strictly for decor purposes!

Staub’s stoneware is designed to spread heat evenly, and it doesn’t absorb moisture, which is how it is able to retain heat while you cook. They’re made to go straight from the refrigerator to the oven or microwave, so you never have to worry about the extreme change in temperatures causing damage or breakage, either. Plus, they’re broiler, freezer, and dishwasher safe, too.
